meanings.definition: The measurement or extent of something from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the students to measure the widths of the desks in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The widths of the river varied along its course.
meanings.sent3: The widths of the sandwiches at the party were all different sizes.
meanings.sent4: The widths of the road seemed to stretch endlessly into the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The tailor carefully noted down the widths of the fabric before cutting.

meanings.definition: The range or extent of something.
meanings.sent1: The widths of flavors available at the ice cream shop delighted the customers.
meanings.sent2: The widths of knowledge covered in the book were impressive.
meanings.sent3: The widths of emotions displayed by the actor moved the audience.
meanings.sent4: The widths of opportunities in the city seemed endless.
meanings.sent5: The widths of the forest held mysteries waiting to be explored.
